article:
In the poor mountains, many  _  can't go to school. They can't learn at school  _  their parents don't have enough money. They are very poor. Many children stay  at home  and help their families make  _  money. In fact, their parents are  _ . They hope their children can go to school just  like  other children. But they can't let their children  go  to school. Some children go to school, but they  may not  go to senior high school or college.
Some people want  to help  the children in poor mountains, so they supply some money to the poor children. And many teachers go to  _  in the least developed areas. All of us hope the children in the poor mountains can go to school happily.
